text: was a Japanese politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party of Japan. He was Minister of Agriculture from 2010 until 2012. He was a member of the National Diet from 1976 until 1979 and again from 2005 until 2012. Kano was born in Yamagata. He died on 21 October 2021 at a Yamagata hospital from problems caused by polycythemia, aged 79.鹿野道彦元衆議院議員が死去 自民・民主両政権で農相など歴任 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Yamagata Prefecture Category:Ministers of agriculture, forestry and fisheries of Japan
title: Michihiko Kano
